text:
dyatiq hRuda#yaqsyAgrE&va# dyaqtyatha# jiqhvAyAq athaq vakSha#sOq yadvai hRuda#yEnABiqgacCa#tiq tajjiqhvayA# vadatiq yajjiqhvayAq vada#tiq taduraqsO&dhiq nirva#datyEqtadvai paqSOrya#thApUqrvaM ~Myasyaiqvama#vaqdAya# yathAqkAmaq-mutta#rEShAmavaqdyati# yathA pUqrvamEqvAsya# paqSOrava#ttaM Bavati maddhyaqtO guqdasyAva# dyati maddhyaqtO hi 
prAqNa u#ttaqmasyAva# dyatyu- [  ] 54
